Key Match Events: Sam Hilliard tied the score with a pinch-hit home run in the ninth inning
Brenton Doyle delivered a game-winning single in the tenth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Coors Field
The game lasted 2 hours and 44 minutes
Others: The starting pitchers were Jameson Taillon for the Cubs and Kyle Freeland for the Rockies
